overview:
She’s currently focusing on the UBook, a new generation of laptop, really innovative. After several years of international experiences, she has obtained a solid and deep knowledge on the laptop market: its challenges and difficulties. She established the most efficient marketing plan to maximize the promotion of the product’s potential, and she’s now looking now for investors to get the next step of this new challenge.

Graduated with high honors, Summa cum laude in European Master of Engineering, she managed to always successfully carry out the entrusted tasks. Developing her self-teaching qualities, she has acquired infinite experiences in management on various domains. In the automobile industry, she worked with major companies like Renault, PSA, Citroen, and Toyota. As senior project manager, she worked as the key collaborator with Renault Automobiles. Also as supervisor, she coordinated the work between different international laboratories participating on the project, located in France, Belgium and Netherlands. Moreover, she was in charge of the standardization of ISO 9000 and EAQF of the company, obtaining the self-agreement for the laboratory from Renault. Her efficiency and strength on management allowed her to administer large annual budgets and to lead a crew of 600 members.

Her objectivity, leadership and experience, allowed her to be surrounded by a young and promising crew capable to overcome to any obstacle and to adapt to changes.

degrees.degree_type: European Engineer / European Master’s Degree in Engineering Summa Cum Laude
degrees.subject: Management & Quality Insurance
Business Administration and Project Management, general
